website_summaries.verdict: A thick, nourishing body butter that hydrates dry skin in a hurry and lasts a long time.
pros: Firm texture, but goes on smoothly
Nourishing and moisturizing on dry skin
cons: Some find the scent to be too strong and unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A KNOCK-OFF!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A KNOCK-OFF! This is definitely NOT the product made by L'Occitane. BEWARE. A total waste of money. Amazon should NOT be recommending this. I've been using the product for years. It is not the real thing. It smells different and does not absorb into the skin as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jody C

customer_reviews.title: Good product, very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Some have reported this product purchased on Amazon being a knock off. But I give it 5 stars as I found my recent purchase to be thick and moisturizing. This new can is thicker than the one I purchased at L’Occatine. Having dry skin I have used many products and I find this to be one of my go-to moisturizers.
customer_reviews.author: Emily92651

customer_reviews.title: The cream received from Amazon differed from the same exact product at an authorized Occitane boutique.
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful.When compared side by side with the same cream at an Occitane boutique,the product from Amazon smelled identical,but was somewhat watery and not as thick.Whether it will do just as good a job, I do not know.Perhaps it was stored at a high temperature? Returning and buying the official Occitane boutique product.
customer_reviews.author: Barry B.

customer_reviews.title: the container is not like the ones sold in store
customer_reviews.text: I think this is fake.. the container is not like the ones sold in store.. don’t see this working, not worth my money. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne L.

customer_reviews.title: The last body moisturizer you'll need/want.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. I'm a dude. I love this stuff. I swim/bike/run/hockey/work outside year-round. This is the only, yes only, cream that effectively cures dry hands, ankles, knees,face, neck, shoulders, nether-regions. It works all day. It's crazy. Other products with alcohol, etc, stop working in 15 minutes. I've bee using it for 2+ years. After my last jar ran out a month ago while on the road, my skin didn't go thru withdrawl and go bad, it was just happy to have it back. And the GF likes the soft, clean smell. It makes me feel luxurious. There. I said it.
customer_reviews.author: swim/bike/run

customer_reviews.title: Theorizing the reduction of angry bruises
customer_reviews.text: After an extensive medical appointment at one of the nation’s leading facilities, the doc mentioned he used this product daily to revitalize his skin’s overall tone that also bruised as significantly as mine. So, I’m not saying that my remarks have the science of a bonafide research study, but, hey, I adore the scent and it feels comforting on limbs prone to looking bruised and battered, so if someone I respect thinks this product’s use is recommendable, I will keep on enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: scribelife

customer_reviews.title: I can't say one is better than the other
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this three times & it came with a seal (silver L'Occitane on the inside) and in one or two days. I just ordered this direct from L'Occitane. There is a difference. I can't say one is better than the other, but this one has a stronger scent reminiscent of Nivia. The one from L'Occitane has a creamier (but not thicker) feel. This is probably a counterfeit, but it is a very nice lotion. My skin loved it.
customer_reviews.author: mountainrunner

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this same cream many times. This is the first time I ordered it from Amazon. I found it to be greasy. It left grease marks on every surface my skin touched even hours after applying. I went into the store and tested the same product. It wasn’t greasy at all. Could this be a bad batch or a phony product?
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the scent
customer_reviews.text: I have several L'Occitane products. I love the ones that are scented with Almond. Thought I would try this one. Not a fan. I kept to use on my legs of an evening at home because the moisturizing properties are so good, but the perfume does not suit me. It may suit others quite well as I think this is a matter of personal preference. (The scent, to me, is a heavy floral and sort of matronly. It does tone down after some time passes from application.) I won't be ordering this one again, but I love the Almond scented products. Their hand lotion is the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: S. Roach

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lotion for cracked hands!
customer_reviews.text: Every year I have super dry hands that crack and bleed. Normally I buy the drug store lotions like Aveeno or Gold bond but they could never keep my hands from cracking. My daughter purchased this from a Sephora for me last Christmas and I repurchased this product a year later through amazon. I’m normally not the type to spend that kind of money on something like lotion but my experience with the lotion has been overly positive and will continue to repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Miller

customer_reviews.title: First winter without itchy skin
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift but I am going to be a customer from here out. This stuff is not cheap but it is worth every penny. I think it's especially great if you live in a dry climate or over a cold winter. I don't think I will be using this in the summer but I will be using it every winter from now on. It is THICK but it spreads well. I use about 2 Tablespoons for my whole body after showering. I used half the jar in one month. That's five dollars a week for silky smooth skin. I'm a fan and future customer.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly E. Niemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Creamy, rich ELIXER
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this 'rich body cream' via another L'Occitane purchase I made, via a small sample packet of it in the box. When I applied the little sample, I couldn't get enough of it. My dry skin was in heaven!!! I swear by L'Occitane lotions and creams. They have a substantial amount of shea butter, which has wondrous properties to enhance skin of all ages. Read the ingredients and you will see the percentage of shea butter is substantial. This is NOT a cheap, watery cream. It is thick and creamy and light. IT IS DIVINE!!! Its clean, fresh smell is subtle. It is worth every penny and I will be purchasing again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Walden

customer_reviews.title: My favorite body cream - Light, Fresh, and Nourishing.
customer_reviews.text: I love this L’Occitane body cream. I’ve been using it for a couple of years now. When COVID closed the stores temporarily and I was out of supply, I was happy to see that I got get it through Amazon. It’s simply my preferred body cream. It’s not heavy on my skin, clean scent, and nourishing. I use it after showering instead of lotion. It keeps my dry skin, especially in winter months, supple and refreshed. It may seem a little pricey, but it lasts a long time. You only need a little to cover the body. I recommend it - for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Cornileus

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST skin moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many brands of lotion that I could open a lotion store. None have helped my itchy skin like this. I'm 60, still have pretty good skin, but this stuff is AMAZING. Worth every single penny! Love the feel, the light scent and of course the effect.
customer_reviews.author: SHAY RON

customer_reviews.title: This is okay for DRY SKIN ⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy something to help moisturize my body, especially because I am pregnant and also have dry skin. I give it a 4⭐ because it is not as rich as I thought. It does moisturize your skin but not as intense as the almond body balm. It leaves the skin with a beautiful glow and clean smell though ! I still love their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I received my first jar of this as a gift. I had no idea how expensive this product was but it doesn't matter because I am hooked. Every winter I have problems with my heels, knees and cuticles getting dry, hard and cracked. It did not happen to me this winter and this jar of heaven is the reason why. After my shower I rub this into my knees, elbows, and feet. Love how it heals and moisturizes without leaving a greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Scent almost ruins it for me.
customer_reviews.text: I actually hate the baby powder/rosey/floral scent. Admittedly it smells like a high end baby powder though lol. It’s not unbearable but, I’d rather it be unscented/neutralized or have a masculine scented version. The moisturizer itself feels amazing though
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: I'm super sensitive to perfumes/scents and this has very little scent ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this last night and I'm so impressed! The tub is HUGE and the body cream is so thick and lovely and I only used the tiniest amount. I know this tub will last me a very long time. The lotion soaked in so quickly and my skin was left feeling clean and hydrated. I usually have to wait for my lotion to dry before dressing but not anymore. I dressed right away and went to bed and not one part of me felt greasy or sticky. Seriously, where has this been my whole life? Also, I'm super sensitive to perfumes/scents and this has very little scent to it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma K

customer_reviews.title: Worth  the $$
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my hands every evening as I get ready for bed. It’s the only lotion, cream, butter or oil I’ve used that prevents the skin on my hands from cracking.
customer_reviews.author: prodigalcat

customer_reviews.title: Product had been opened prior to delivery
customer_reviews.text: I bought and sent this for a birthday gift for an elderly lady who lives far from me., so I was so disappointed when she told me it had been opening. She didn't want to try and return it, so she kept it. I was very disappointed though.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma7

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive. Not my kind of lotion.
customer_reviews.text: Not my kind of lotion. I like the lotion and it works but I think I could find a similar one half the price. Not as much lotion in it as I'd like and a little does not go along way. I have to us a lot just for my legs. I didn't like that it would leave my hands and legs all oily but I guess that's because of all the oils it has in it. Too pricey for me but a good lotion if you have $40 to spend and like oily lotions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very strong perfume
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this cream! I was a little put off that it felt waxy when applied, does not absorb well and kind of just sits on top of the skin. The scent is super strong, and when applying at the gym locker or on your hands during travel - you will definitely draw attention!
customer_reviews.author: Vanya

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer, ever! I have mature skin, and from too many years in the sun my legs look like lizard skin. It is really horrible, especially in the winter. I have tried just about every brand you can think of, and they only camoflage the dryness; nothing improved it except this body cream. This stuff is really amazing and worth evey penny. I am using the L'Occitane Shea butter body scrub, and the Ultra Rich Body Cream and my skin looks incredible. My skin is silky smooth and soft. Nothing heals sun damaged skin, but this is as close as I've found to a cure.
customer_reviews.author: Kate August

customer_reviews.title: Silky and Beautiful Soft Scent
customer_reviews.text: Very wonderful moisturizer. I am giving it 4 stars, b/c I'm not sure that I'd buy it again at this price, but it is a nice product. It reminds me of a faint baby smell to it, which I like. Being pregnant, I am even more picky about my scents and lotions and this feels pretty luxurious and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Shahamat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Best body moisturizer I’ve ever used. Keeps skin soft for at least 2 days without reapplying. I also sent it a gift and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Irish

customer_reviews.title: Pure luxury.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredibly expensive, so be warned, once you try it you will buy it again and again. Simply the best all-over-body moisturizing cream. Rich, thick, luxurious, smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice moisturizer but beware of scent
customer_reviews.text: The texture and feel of the moisturizer is wonderful. The scent, not so much. It’s not overly strong, but smells of old lady. I had hoped it wouldn’t, because other reviews said it smelled great. Maybe if you’re 95.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Definitely something special
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely something special. I use it to keep the area around my recent surgery moisturized and also on my dry skin (face, feet, and legs). This doesn't feel greasy and my skin seems to just drink it up. It has a very light scent that smells really good. This is well worth the price. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: RickyT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for FEET
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell & love this on my feet but I needed to cover them with socks. It is a bit too greasy for me. My skin doent soak it up well. It helped my rough elbows. So, kind of a mixture of feelings but I wont reorder.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Ultra rich body cream does what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: Having used many of the L'Occitane products. I'm pleased with this Ultra Rich Body Cream as it does what it claims, really working well on dry skin. The reason I didn't give it five stars is that I wanted a lavender scent and ordered this, knowing that it didn't have that scent and hoping that I'd like the cream even without the lavender scent. I like the cream, but I do wish it came in lavender.
customer_reviews.author: asiana

customer_reviews.title: Rich and luxurious
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product and the effectiveness is amazing. It only takes a small amount to do a great job. Good quality for the costs. This was a repeat order for me Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years and LOVE it. It’s non scented, great moisturizer , and great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: amanda ott

customer_reviews.title: Best Body Cream
customer_reviews.text: I have used almost every brand of lotion & nothing compares to this body cream. It's creamy, decadent, rich. It has the look of butter. Shea Butter Ultra Rich Body Cream, there is absolutely nothing that pampers your skin better. I guarantee it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: Butter...
customer_reviews.text: Not the kind of butter you put on your biscuits....but you can use it to butter your biscuits...if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: R J.

customer_reviews.title: The package was not handed directly to a resident as stated.
customer_reviews.text: - Note, the product is great. - My comment is about the tracking information provided by Amazon. Online tracking information said "Your package was delivered. It was handed directly to a resident." It was not handed directly to a resident. After reading this we went searching for the package. The package was found by our front gate.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: which drys my hands up really bad. This cream does a great job healing up ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, and she loves it! She is very picky on what skin care products she uses, but she really digs this stuff. As a guy, I don't typically get to excited about skin care stuff, but I have been doing a lot of remodeling, which drys my hands up really bad. This cream does a great job healing up my hands, and doesn't leave them with that greasy feeling!
customer_reviews.author: J. Munzer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff stinks
customer_reviews.text: If you are sensitive to smells - avoid! This stuff smells like old lady power smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great product...really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite body cream. Works on my dry spots well-especially my feet. I love the light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E.

customer_reviews.title: Best body cream EVER🤗🤗🤗🤗
customer_reviews.text: A coworker allow me to try this product for the first time and I must say I love feel of this product because it not greasy and it smell AMAZING . I ordered my very own but the postal Office mess up the packaging . I can’t wait to reorder this product😍😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: lcampbell25

customer_reviews.title: God I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: So decadent and rich. I definitely make sure I spoil myself with a tub of this each Christmas. Love Shea butter, and this smells so lovely, but it also takes care of my dry, dry skin in the Winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett May

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful butter!
customer_reviews.text: Luxurious as it gets. Beautiful scent, luscious feel on the skin. Hydrates well, not at all oily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cieri

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse I always use the handcream, the most wonderful hand cream in the world. I now live this body cream just as much. The scent is not as strong as the hand cream, I love them both. I use it as a face cream also, and my skin is so soft, and even, no dry spots.
customer_reviews.author: barbara l

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It helps me with my dry skin right away, especially during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious cream with pretty, gently scent
customer_reviews.text: Lovely scented rich cream. Not greasy. Keep at my bedside for hands and feet before sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great body lotion/cream for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: This cream is excellent for people with dry skin. I live in new england, and during the winter, my skin is so dry, it flakes off. Other lotions only work for a couple of hours - after that, my skin looks dry again. This cream kept my skin looking and feeling moisturizer until my next shower! It also has a very nice consistency, and it doesn't look or feel greasy or shiny on your skin. It smells very nice too - pleasant, not over-powering, and mild. I don't like most fragrances, so it's rare when I actually like the way a lotion or cream smells!
customer_reviews.author: Bostonhomeowner

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I live in a desert environment and this cream works better than most of the others I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Grosvenor

customer_reviews.title: FINE Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife AID puts this product all over her body 7 days a week . She got this cream as a gift a few years ago
customer_reviews.author: bernard gold

customer_reviews.title: A classic go to company for that special someone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific brand and is high quality for all there products.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Sarmas

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: It is the most luxurious scented skin softener I’ve ever had. It is a little moist going on, but absorbs quickly, leaving your skin feeling soft supple and moist
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is thick and therefore is very moisturizing! I love that it does not have a strong scent and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as my sole face cream for years. I like to keep my beauty regime simple. This works great! I also have sensitive skin and this does not cause break outs like most lotions or creams I've tried. It goes on smooth and soaks in so you feel like you don't have anything on. In addition to good genes, it is the reason I look 10 years younger than I am.
customer_reviews.author: Aynroger

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best creams ever
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best creams ever. it is truly healing and effective. Lovely scent and it works perfectly to keep the skin moist without being greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Pwt

customer_reviews.title: So so good!
customer_reviews.text: As with anything from L'Occitane, this is an amazing product. This cream soothes and moisturizes even the most dry, flaky skin, and the scent is light and pleasant. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: No substitute.
customer_reviews.text: Dry skin gone for over a year now. Every day after showering. The best body moisturizing product I have ever(in 68 years) used.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in gold
customer_reviews.text: I first encountered this cream last April at my cousin's house. She is nearly 90, and absolutely gorgeous, with skin better than mine, and I'm 66. I wrote down the pertinent info and ordered from Amazon the minute I got home and am now on my second jar. It smells lovely and fresh, like clean laundry, moisturizes my face at night and before applying makeup, smooths my legs and feet before bed, keeps my hands from chapping and splitting during the day, and is one of my best purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: CrescentMoon1145

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizer on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I have never used such a wonderful body cream in my life. It truly moisturizes better than anything else and stays moisturized until the next shower time. Only drawback is that I used one jar every 2 weeks and it becomes very expensive at $44.00 a jar. Wish there was a discount for buying large quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Chumper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It arrived quickly and in good shape. It is not greasy and I have used it for years. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: ceadm

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product Soft
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product Soft, rich, no resedue, all cream absorbs quickly Skin feels smooth and nourished I have very dry skin it’s a lifesaver for me
customer_reviews.author: YELENA S.

customer_reviews.title: Feels So Good!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream! It's soft as butter, has a subtle scent, massages in quickly with no greasy residue, and eliminates the dry look and feel. Great on my face and body!
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Kathy

customer_reviews.title: best thing for eczema skin
customer_reviews.text: nothing competes with this cream. ive tried switching over to others throughout the years and i always come back to this body cream because nothing prevents rashes like this. i have eczema
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This cream is the best I have ever used. Especially for my neck. I will use it always.
customer_reviews.author: amazon reader

customer_reviews.title: L'OCCITANE Shea Butter Moisturizing Cream-The Best!
customer_reviews.text: L'Occitane products never disappoint! This is the best moisturizing shea butter cream, soothes and nourishes immediately with no greasy residue. I am never without it!
customer_reviews.author: MzCatnip

customer_reviews.title: Love this body cream!
customer_reviews.text: My boss buys me L’Occitane gift sets for Christmas every year and now I use this body cream exclusively. It’s magic. I love it. Great for dry hands, too. A little bit goes a long way. The 6.9 oz size lasts for months.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Turkel

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product, and plenty in the jar. Scent is subtle: just right. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wyepacket

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and it is absorbs well into your ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and it is absorbs well into your skin. Its expensive but I've tried other shea butter product that do not compare!
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer I have ever used! Give it a try you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: I will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.text: The product is average for the economic value. I expected a better product based on the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for working hands!
customer_reviews.text: So smooth, nice light fragrance. Doesn’t leave greasy residue. So nice!
customer_reviews.author: Melovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: Very Rich
customer_reviews.text: L’Occitane shea butter products are the only ones I can use for my sensitive skin. Costly but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Healing Qualities For Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is very rich and the shea butter in it will help you nourish your dry skin. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexx

customer_reviews.title: Not just for women!
customer_reviews.text: Someone had given me a partial jar of this stuff some time ago. I decided to try it on my face after shaving to ease the stinging - after shave only makes it worse. The product eases the stinging and at the same time doesn't smell "girly". I'll buy again. Just wish it wasn't so expensive. The good news is that it does go a long way. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT - Deep and long-lasting moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Thick, creamy consistency with a subtle, non-overpowering scent. I use this daily after my shower in the winter or whenever I want deep moisturing. I have used L'Occitane products for years and haven't been disappointed yet. This rates right up there with some of their best products. It's pricey but one tub lasts up to 3-4 months even with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Moisture cream
customer_reviews.text: Like the product. It goes into the skin and does not get on your clothes
customer_reviews.author: Pace

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: Great product have purchased this many times and never get tired of it.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best moisturizing cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is super-moisturizing, and it lasts all day. You only need to use a small amount to get a great result. I've used this for years, and have found nothing that even comes close to a cream that works this well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: GREAT NATURAL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a body cream that really hydrates your skin without an artifical odor then this is it. It may seems expensive but it abosorbs quickly and a little goes a very long way. My wife uses it after her morning shower over her entire body and the 7 ounces lasts about two months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best moisturizer I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: My Doctor let me try this as my skin was so dry it was like fish-scales falling off. ONE use at my Doctors convinced me I need this product. If you have dry skin you need this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful night moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect night cream to revitalize skin. Rich and very moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: Kathy's Notes

customer_reviews.title: The feel of luxury!
customer_reviews.text: Love the L'Occitane Shea Butter Ultra Rich Body Cream! I started using this on my arms and have gradually used it on areas--legs, feet, etc. It goes on smoothly without feeling greasy. In the period of time that I did not have any, I really noticed a difference in my skin. Now that I have a new supply, I am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: May's Daughter

customer_reviews.title: great body cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is great; not greasy, absorbed easily, smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Great Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and this product and all L'Occitane work great. Especially, the almond scented products.
customer_reviews.author: bad book

customer_reviews.title: ORDER THIS ITS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever had. Hands and feet get soft right away. No more dry skin
customer_reviews.author: sandie

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the smell much and it takes a bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but the texture and consistency of the one I received from Amazon was very different from the one on display in Sephora. I don't like the smell much and it takes a bit too long to dissolve into the skin. It moisturizes about the same as Nivea does.
customer_reviews.author: M.Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works for her
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom. She has used it before and she really likes it. It helps to give the extra umph for when winter is taking a toll on your skin. Leaves you feeling soft and smooth with a pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Grantham

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It's one of the things that's on her list year after year. Pricey, but worth every penny. One jar seems to last her through the winter. She loves the texture and the smell. I'll keep stuffing the stocking with it I guess.
customer_reviews.author: OBX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream! Rich, highly moisturizing and has a delicious smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exellent! My skin at the shins was very dry and therefore it was scratched. This cream moisturizes very dry skin. I use the cream once per two days because it works so well that I actually do not need to use it more. The product is expensive but a jar is big and there is a lot of cream.
customer_reviews.author: oxana

customer_reviews.title: Great body cream
customer_reviews.text: This is the second order of this product and I really like it. Not sickly or smelly. Love all L'Occtiane products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This brand is simply the BEST in moisturizing dry skin. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: MGMuselli

customer_reviews.title: love, love, love this product
customer_reviews.text: it just soaks into your skin and keeps it hydrated all day even in negative below temps without feeling greasy. a big plus is that all shea butter products from L'Occitane are set up as a sustainable and fair trade partnership with the women who produce it in Burkina Faso.
customer_reviews.author: chotoro

customer_reviews.title: Great For Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin was very dry. This creame took care of the problem within a couple of days. It has a mild scent so that it it doesn't interfere with other scents I might ware. The tub makes it easy to get every bit of the cream out.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best body cream.
customer_reviews.text: Use this body cream for my dry skin. I have tried many dry skin creams, this one wins over everything else I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Millie G. Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: This cream is great
customer_reviews.text: Igave this cream as a gift and the person raves about how soft the L'Occitane Body Cream makes your skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, just as I expected it to!
customer_reviews.author: Constance Gappa Richey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best body cream invented. Third time purchasing, will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sortkwick

customer_reviews.title: Great thick body cream
customer_reviews.text: Perfect body cream for anyone with dry skin, lovely smell too, I just love everything about this moisturizer and I'll definitely be buying it again. Speedy transaction too- fast shipping. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Erie05

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but good
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey by I love this Body Lotion. I use it every day. Silky smooth skin and has the signature L'Occitane scent. Its lasted a few weeks and I'll definitely be ordering again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Feels wonderful on my skin. Moistening but not greasy. Fist time I have purchased this but product, I will be a return customer.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie I.

customer_reviews.title: Try it you'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a reorder for me, I love this cream, it works wonders on the neck and also on the poor old winter dried feet... a little pricey but very good
customer_reviews.author: "sam"

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cream
customer_reviews.text: I always have the problem of getting dry scaly skin which escalated into itchy red rashes during the dry cold weather. I tried numerous products but my skin will still itch. But this! This product is not cheap but it solve my problem of having rashes and itchiness. It's totally good for people who have sensitive skin too cos my sister has eczema and she is fine using it.
customer_reviews.author: Clara167

product_meta.title: L'Occitane Ultra Rich Body Cream, 6.9 oz
product_meta.description:
It helps to moisturize intensely, leaving skin nourished and protected from the elements. Enriched with softening apricot oil and moisturizing extracts it helps to soften and comfort the skin without leaving a greasy film.

BRAND STORY
By L'Occitane
